num_months.description: Number of months used in ground heat exchanger sizing.

timestep.description:
Simulation timestep used in ground heat exchanger sizing.

Options include 'HYBRID' or 'HOURLY'. 'HYBRID' is the primary choice due to its faster processing. 

 However, the option 'HOURLY' enables hourly simulation with load aggregation algorithm at a decent pace, while more accuracy in simulation is required.
